name: Google Ads Ingestion
description: Ingest Google Ads data (customers, campaigns, ads, metrics) using dlt. Mimics Supermetrics and Funnel.io.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Google Ads data as pandas DataFrame for downstream transformation

developer_token.label: Developer Token
developer_token.description: Google Ads API developer token. Use ${GOOGLE_ADS_DEV_TOKEN} for env vars.

client_id.label: OAuth Client ID
client_id.description: Google OAuth Client ID. Use ${GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_ID} for env vars.

client_secret.label: OAuth Client Secret
client_secret.description: Google OAuth Client Secret. Use ${GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_SECRET} for env vars.

refresh_token.label: OAuth Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Google OAuth Refresh Token. Use ${GOOGLE_ADS_REFRESH_TOKEN} for env vars.

use_service_account.label: Use Service Account
use_service_account.description: Use service account authentication instead of OAuth

project_id.label: Google Cloud Project ID
project_id.description: Project ID (for service account or OAuth)

service_account_email.label: Service Account Email
service_account_email.description: Service account email (if using service account)

private_key.label: Private Key
private_key.description: Service account private key. Use ${GOOGLE_ADS_PRIVATE_KEY} for env vars.

resources.label: Resources to Extract
resources.description: Comma-separated list: customers, campaigns, ad_groups, ads, keywords, change_events

start_date.label: Start Date
start_date.description: Start date for metrics (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to 30 days ago.

end_date.label: End Date
end_date.description: End date for metrics (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.
